full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA BRGYAD STONG PA KUN TU RGYU 'PHRENG BA CAN NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011B (CES 'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA BRGYAD STONG PA KUN TU RGYU 'PHRENG BA CAN ^MKHAS BTZUN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS ZHUS DAG MDZAD PA'I BOD PAR MA LAS PA SHUS TE YIG 'BRU GSAL ZHING BUSTIKA CHE BA LEGS PAR BZHENGS PA'I YI GE PA DBU MDZAD BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL, DGE TSUL BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL, BLO BZANG TSE DBANG, BSOD NAMS TSE RING, YON TAN RGYA MTSO SOGS DANG, ZHUS DAG PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSOD NAMS, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG TSE DPAG GNYIS KYIS BGYIS SHING, NA BZA' GLEGS SHING GLEGS THAG SOGS CHA 'GRIG BYUNG BA'I DGE BA BSNGO BA'I TSIGS BCAD SNYOMS LAS LE LO'I RNAL 'BYOR BA ^RJE BTZUN DAM PA'I MING 'DZIN GYIS LCAGS SPRE GRO BZHIN ZLA BA'I TSES LA BRIS PA DZA YANTU, ,)
